title: Alrayan Undertow
description:
DLC "Alrayan Undertow" adds following content for the Indies Lies.
1. New Knight class with 3 new characters.
2. 3 new Story with more than 10k words each.
3. 70+ new cards.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Alrayan Undertow DLC
<!--text-->
DLC "Alrayan Undertow" adds following content for the Indies Lies
1. New Knight class with 3 new characters.
2. 3 new Story with more than 10k words each.
3. 70+ new cards.
